name: Ninja Adventures (EmilDev)
description:
Hey, im a bit new developer and i would like you to check my first game. 

   You can rate it at the end if it doesnt bother you. :)

There is a ninja  called Ezio and he is trying to survive from enemies. The danger is rising a lot by going to other places to protect yourself. 

The Goal is to survive from enemies and kill them.

It will probably be multiplayer after downloads

It will be soon  uploaded on Steam

It will be uploaded in 1-2 months.  Hope you Like it!!

You should kill these enemies to be Free!

PC Controls:

  • Arrows or A-D  - Moving
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Click (mouse) - Melee Attack
  • Right Click (mouse) - Ranged Attack 
  • Q - Dash back
  • W - Dash front
  • Alt+Enter - Toggle fullscreen

#PC
